quote_text: FROM IDEA TO INTERACTIVE INTERFACE – WITH INSPIRATION AND CARE.

about_items.title: About Me
about_items.content: I'm Kateryna Troyan, and I'm passionate about creating fast, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, specialising in developing interactive and visually appealing interfaces that improve user experience and help achieve business goals. I always adhere to the principles of clean code, attention to detail, and result orientation. I help companies strengthen their online reputation with high-quality, user-friendly, and technologically advanced web solutions.

about_items.title: Goals
about_items.content:
Develop as a Frontend developer
Participate in cool projects
Create user-friendly interfaces for people

about_items.title: Education
about_items.content:
2024-2025 IT School GoIT
Fullstack Developer
2002-2007 National University of Life and Environmental Sciences of Ukraine, Master's degree

benefits_items.title: Focus on results and effective cooperation
benefits_items.text: My goal is not just to create an interface, but to help your business work more efficiently. The result for me is not just code, but real value for you and your customers.

benefits_items.title: Responsibility and communication
benefits_items.text: I am attentive to tasks, meet deadlines, and am open to constructive criticism. It is important to me that the result meets your expectations.

benefits_items.title: Fast and diligent execution
benefits_items.text: I understand the value of time. I do my work conscientiously, with a focus on quality and detail, even under tight deadlines.

projects_list.title: Simply Chocolate
projects_list.description: A website for a premium chocolate brand using modern responsive layout, semantic HTML structure, interactive effects and smooth animation. Optimized for tablets and mobile devices.

projects_list.title: KinoClick
projects_list.description: A web application in React.js with API integration for searching movies. Displays posters, titles, and short descriptions.

projects_list.title: Wacky Battles
projects_list.description: A landing page for the Wacky Battles game by Evoplay. Includes adaptive and visually appealing sections like Hero, About, Game Features.

projects_list.title: Happy Cake
projects_list.description: A fully responsive site for a cake company using HTML and CSS. Includes hover effects, animations, and modal window. Follows mobile-first principles.

projects_list.title: Seek and you shall find
projects_list.description: A React web app using a public API to search images by keywords. Includes interactive elements and responsive design.

projects_list.title: Phonebook
projects_list.description: A React application with auth, contact storage on the server, search, deletion, and form validation.

modal_title: Thank you for your interest in cooperation!
modal_text: I will be in touch with you shortly to discuss further details and opportunities for cooperation. Please stay in touch.
